actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, Treasury.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A concurrent resolution to provide that Congress should freeze Federal discretionary spending for fiscal year 1986 at the fiscal year 1985 level and that no cost-of-living adjustments should take effect during fiscal year 1986.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that there shall be no increase in Federal payments, benefit amounts, or discretionary spending for FY 1986.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to provide that Congress should freeze Federal discretionary spending for fiscal year 1986 at the fiscal year 1985 level and that no cost-of-living adjustments should take effect during fiscal year 1986.
